sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>sys_data_source</collection>
        <condition>current.import_set_table_name.changes()</condition>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Set table name</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority/>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[var s = current.import_set_table_name.toString();

s = s.toLowerCase();
s = replaceAll(s, " ", "_");

var db = GlideDBObjectManager;
if (db.getAbsoluteBase(s) != "sys_import_set_row") {
  var td = GlideTableDescriptor;
  if (td.isValid(s)) {
    current.import_set_table_name.setError("Import set table must be an extension of sys_import_set_row");
    current.setAbortAction(true);
  }
} else {
  current.import_set_table_name = s;
}

function replaceAll(str, from, to) {
  var idx = str.indexOf( from );

  while ( idx > -1 ) {
   str = str.replace( from, to ); 
   idx = str.indexOf( from );
  }
  
  return str;    
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2007-11-08 18:11:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path/>
        <sys_id>2073588f0a0a0b8000a1098b9c9fac98</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set table name</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="System Import Data Source" source="com.glide.system_import_data_source">0463fca03c31311068bcf327dfe37f49</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_2073588f0a0a0b8000a1098b9c9fac98</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>glide.maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2008-07-22 22:20:41</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>before</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2073588f0a0a0b8000a1098b9c9fac98"/>
</record_update>
